how_to_deploy.zh:
部署說明：
1. 將您的PDF Toolkit上傳到GitHub倉庫
2. 修改上面的update_check_url和download_url為您的實際倉庫地址
3. 創建Release版本時，確保tag格式為 v4.1.0 這樣的形式
4. 在Release中描述更新內容，這會顯示在更新對話框中
how_to_deploy.en:
Deployment Instructions:
1. Upload your PDF Toolkit to a GitHub repository
2. Update the update_check_url and download_url above to your actual repository URLs
3. When creating releases, ensure tag format is like v4.1.0
4. Describe update content in Release notes, which will be shown in update dialog
